alert.note: Alert for Winona (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 04 at 10:37AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Winona County through 1115 AM CDT... At 1036 AM CDT, trained weather spotters reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Dover to near Rushford. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported half inch sized hail at 1030 am near Rochester. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Altura around 1055 AM CDT. Rollingstone around 1100 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Saratoga, Whitewater State Park, Elba, Wyattville, Wilson, Ridgeway, and Whitman. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 233 and 266. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
